title: Front end development
content: The last months I have studyd React at Merkle. Before that i have done some work with HTML, CSS & Javascript (jQuery). This website is build in React.

title: UX Design
content: Before I was a front-end developer i was a  UX designer with a focus on wireframing, flowcharting & user research. My main clients where Alzheimer Nederland and Rabobank.

title: The future
content: In the future I want to learn more about coding, become a Front-end developer. Beceause i believe there are much opportunities for me if i can combine my front-end and UX skills.
